content: I can’t wait to have a child I’m going to do so many drugs around it and leave it unattended in sooooo many places
I’m going to make it a point to do heroin with my kid in the car so I end up passing out in the front seat with the child left unattended
And then when cps tries to take your kid, tell them it's just a disease
I’ll also tell my kid they can be whatever gender they want because “gender norms are misogynistic” lmaooooo
The only thing they're not allowed to be is a conservative or Republican. They need to think for themselves unless it's thinking like that
Of course. What kind of parent would I be if I didn’t teach them the importance of socialism in America and that we should obviously ban guns and take all of the rich peoples money
